about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure in the sewers of Radioactive Dwarfs, where the most dangerous and vile creatures lurk. With NES-style graphics and a chiptune soundtrack, this retro-style game will keep you on the edge of your seat. The city is terrified as cases of missing people become more frequent, and it's up to you to help the armed heroine fight back against the ancient underground settlement of evil dwarfs that has awoken. With a top-down shooter gameplay and many enemies, items, secrets, and bonus levels, you'll need all your skills to survive this adventure. Don't miss out on this unique and challenging game with its dark humor in the style of b movies.

- A new retro-style adventure game that will definitely challenge you
- Unique graphics and sounds
- Loads of enemies and items
- Improve your weapons and abilities
- More than 20 unique levels with new elements in each level
- 2 types of bonus levels (dangerous and safe)
- Secret levels, teleports, secrets, and Easter eggs
- 8-bit music soundtrack
- A story with colorful cut scenes and Bosses

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU G860
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

short_description: Blast through the sewers in Radioactive Dwarfs! Retro top-down shooter with NES-style pixel graphics and chiptune music. Help the armed heroine search for her brother in an underground dwarven settlement: many enemies, items, secrets, and bonus levels. A thrilling adventure awaits!
